tracks.title: We Fell From The Sky
tracks.lyrics:
Hiding under skies and umbrellas,
It rained mysteriously frail, just like glass.
Feelings rotting like the meat on my bones,
Falling apart, so delicate, won’t last.
I watched as the ground pulled us closer,
Each second stretched, with our hearts finally sober.
Gravity's pull, it wraps around tight,
We hold on for now knowing it'll all soon be over.

We fell from the sky, and now we know,
Everything that rises must let go.
Like echoes of dreams we cannot keep,
We float through the air, and quietly sleep.

As the walls of the universe expand,
The horizon sinks deeper, out of hand.
Fear on my face, I can’t hide from the truth,
What’s beautiful fades, and all slips through.
I tried to reach out, but the stars slipped away,
Falling like ash at the end of the day.
The sky was our cradle, but now it’s our grave,
We drift through the silence, no strength left to save.

We fell from the sky, and now we know,
Everything that rises must let go.
Like echoes of dreams we cannot keep,
We float through the air, and quietly sleep.

Gravity wraps around, forming new skin,
We were weightless once, but can’t begin again.
The wound is still fresh, my love was so sweet,
But even the sky is falling at our feet.

So pick me up from the floor once more,
Carry me down to the place where I felt safe before 
We fell from the sky, and that’s all we know,
Fragile as glass, we let ourselves go.

tracks.title: The Greatest Tragedy
tracks.lyrics:
Jesus got lynched, no doubt about it,
A tragedy written in stone.
But the greatest one is still unwritten,
Waiting to carve its name in bone.

The tears don’t hurt; they’re only water,
The sky above is just air.

The greatest tragedy, yet to unfold,
A story waiting, dark and cold.
The greatest tragedy, we’re all to blame,
The blood and fire will bear our names.

The mystery spins, a shadowed riddle,
Getting scrutinized to death.
But soon we’ll see with unclouded eyes,
The truth inside our final breath.

The sight we need, the grace to forgive,
To love, to heal, and learn to live.

The greatest tragedy, yet to unfold,
A story waiting, dark and cold.
The greatest tragedy, we’re all to blame,
The blood and fire will bear our names.

No savior can save us from ourselves,
No martyr’s sacrifice will break the spell.
The greatest tragedy is yet to be,
A reflection of our history.

The tears don’t hurt; they’re only water.
The sky won’t fall; it’s only air.

The greatest tragedy, yet to unfold,
A story waiting, dark and cold.
The greatest tragedy, we’re all to blame,
The blood and fire will bear our names.

The greatest tragedy is waiting still,
Its echo rising, its shadow will.

tracks.title: Defeating Thoughts
tracks.lyrics:
At the helm, but auto-pilot’s on,
Rewinding the past, where have I gone wrong?
Stuck in this movie, can’t find the remote,
Replaying old scenes that choke in my throat.
My gears spin backward, I can’t seem to quit,
The deeper I go, the harder I slip.
Every mistake, like a scar on my soul,
I’m a ghost in the system, can’t find the controls.

One defeating thought led to another,
And then another,
And then another,
I ask myself, why do I even bother?
One defeating thought led to another,
And then another,
And then another,
I ask myself, will I ever recover?

The clock keeps ticking, but I’m standing still,
Lost in the shadows of my own free will.
The coffee’s gone cold, but I drink it all down,
Numb to the taste, lost in this town.
I’m driving in circles with the tank on E,
The radio’s busted, but it’s all I need.
These thoughts keep looping like a broken cassette,
Spitting out lines I just can’t forget.

I’m wired to the noise, but I crave the silence,
Caught in the middle of comfort and violence.
The signals are crossed, and I’m losing my way,
Fading in shadows, where night eats the day.
If I could just break through, smash the machine,
Escape from this loop, wipe the system clean.
But the more I resist, the tighter it clings,
A symphony of chaos that endlessly sings.

One defeating thought led to another,
And then another,
And then another,
I ask myself, why do I even bother?
One defeating thought led to another,
And then another,
And then another,
I ask myself, will I ever recover?

tracks.title: The Fool
tracks.lyrics:
i gave up on learning
said i wasn’t built for it
called myself cursed
and let the fear sit
watched others rise
while i played dead
called it wisdom
but it was just dread

i wore the clown suit
so no one would ask
about the cracks in my skin
or the weight in my mask
said “i’m just joking”
after every cry
i laughed at my grief
and let myself die

but i’m not the fool
you made me feel like
i was just a mirror
catching the wrong light
i bent to survive
and called it a pose
but now i know
what i didn’t know

i used to think
i had nothing to give
but i gave everything
just to live
and maybe i missed
some cues and signs
but i always showed up
even when i lied

“there’s a difference
between being blind
and being afraid
to see”

i’m not the fool
you kept in your play
i just forgot
i could walk away
i bent to survive
and called it a pose
but now i know
what i didn’t know

call me naive
call me strange
i just call it change

tracks.title: Invisible Audience
tracks.lyrics:
I saw them in the shadows, faceless yet known, 
Whispers crawling up my spine, a secret of my own. 
The audience watches, silent but close,
What do they know? And what are they waiting for?

Every glance is a message, 
But none of them speak, 
I’m trapped in their silence, 
With no answers to seek. 

Let them watch, let them scheme, 
I’m caught inside this unseen dream. 
They wait for something, but I don’t know what, 
Tangled in their gaze, tied up in knots. 
Dark stain, I can’t scrub clean, 
Let them watch, let them scheme, 
Their silence is louder than my screams.
Is louder than my screams. 

I felt the ground shake, and a ripple through the sky, 
Believed the world burned in my name, and never knowing why. 
Did I make it rain? Could this be my curse? 
Every eye turned my way, As it kept getting worse. 

What do they want from me? What are they waiting for? 
I feel their judgment like knives in my core. 

Let them watch, let them judge, 
I cannot bear this heavy grudge. 
A shadow haunts me, fills my mind, 
Their gaze has changed me, made me blind. 
I thought they'd reach out, pull me through, 
But here I stand—what else can I do? 
Let them judge, let them pry, 
I can’t tell what they want or why. 

I wait for the signal, 
for the word, for the call, 
But the waiting never ends,
It consumes me whole

Believed for so long that I was their instrument. 
Now the truth splits me open, fragile and small. 
I won’t move, I won’t fall, I won't heed their call 

Let them wait, let them stare, 
I’ll stay here—standing perfectly still. 
Let them poke, let them prod,
I won't be their token god.
The vultures circle, wasting away
As I stand still they lose their way 
The audience lingers, but I’ll stand strong, 
Silent, defiant—right where I belong.

tracks.title: The Cure
tracks.lyrics:
Your hideous tumor, growing inside
A sickness you can’t run from, nowhere to hide
Freezing yourself, trying to survive
Holding the wound just to stay alive

I am the cure you cannot take
The poison inside you can’t forsake
Locked in a cage you made alone
My voice the whisper, the undertone

Each day you carry it, sinking deep
A weight on your heart, robbing sleep
Invisible, yet it colors the light
Holding tight, it swallows your fight

I am the cure you cannot take
The poison inside you can’t forsake
Locked in a cage you made alone
My voice the whisper, the undertone

It grows like shadows, inch by inch
A silent tether, an iron clench
You freeze yourself to keep it close
A haunting bond, your quiet ghost

You’d cut it out, but it’s too late
Embedded deep, sealing your fate
It knows your name, it calls you home
A cage of glass, flesh, and bone

I am the cure you cannot take
The poison inside you can’t forsake
Locked in a cage you made alone
My voice the whisper, the undertone

tracks.title: Exit Signs Over Water
tracks.lyrics:
I can see the signs, flicker like ghosts above the tide,
But my feet are chained to the calm, I’ve lost the will to fight.
There’s nothing left to save me now,
Just shadows dancing on the sea somehow.

I search for air, but it’s fading fast,
I doubt I’ll find my way to the surface at last.

Exit signs over water,
Calling me but fading fast.
In this endless quiet, nothing matters,
I’m drowning, lost in the past.
Exit signs over water,
Flickering dreams I can’t reclaim,
In the stillness, my heart shatters,
Yet I keep reaching just the same.

I thought I heard your voice in the crash of the waves,
But you’re lost in the currents of everything I couldn’t save.
The horizon fades, and I disappear,
Chasing echoes only I can hear.

I search for light, but it’s slipping away,
I’m sinking deeper into the quiet gray.

Exit signs over water,
Calling me but fading fast.
In this endless quiet, nothing matters,
I’m drowning, lost in the past.
Exit signs over water,
Flickering dreams I can’t reclaim,
In the stillness, my heart shatters,
Yet I keep reaching just the same.

I’m sinking deeper now, the signs flicker out of view,
If I never leave this place, will I still dream of you?
The water rises, and I’m swept away,
But I’ll keep searching for another day.
The signs disappear, the water swallows me whole,
I’m still reaching, though I know, I’ll never let go...

tracks.title: Brother's Last Drag
tracks.lyrics:
Ghosts of high school
Taunting the sane
Memories linger
Like nicotine stains

Cigarette burns
on a broken hearts
Brother's last drag
over before it could start

Down to the filter,
deep in the lung
Beneath all the layers
where shadows are hung

Echoes of laughter,
twisted and cruel
Carved into the halls
of a forgotten school

In the haze of smoke
where time stands still
Caught in the echoes 
of the nights we kill
Can't escape the shadows
of who we could be
Trapped in high school's hell
for eternity
Blurry faces in old yearbook pages
Lost in the halls
locked in their cages
Trapped in a world 
that just don't 
Brother's last drag 
still lingers in the air

Scratched out faces,
stories untold
Trapped in a teenage dream
While the rest of us grow old

Your songs taped over
Lost in the hum
But if you play it backwards
A glimmer of hope might come

He held the pain
deep in his chest
Then cancer came
and put him to rest
A young life lost
never had a chance to bloom
Brother exhaled his last drag
way too soon.

tracks.title: No Cares Given
tracks.lyrics:
In the long, cold halls 
that echoed silence
every corner, every space 
stained with pain 
Whispers soft 
morphed into words of harsh violence.
Yet they never saw the damage, 
never saw the stain.
They roamed eyes close, 
heart sealed 
unaware of caring of the suffering revealed 
yet amidst and it all your spirit refused to yield
in the face of torment it was your armour 
Your shield
They didn’t give a care
Amid the chilling fear 
No cares given here
in the shadow of the despair 
With blind eyes everywhere 
not giving a single care 
And you were there

through the torment, the cruelty and the laughter 
your spirit remained free 
hope soared thereafter 
in the verses of sweet disaster
on a crumpled up page.
Your silent war was waged 
with every pen stroke 
you weaved a tale 
of courage and resilience 
in the face of a gale.
And through it all 
your heart it didn't fail
in the symphony of life 
your melody prevailed.

They didn't give a care 
Behind their vacant stairs.
Not a single care.
Yet in this unusually cruel 
and endless nightmare 
your soul danced on a snare.

Then you weren't there.

They didn’t give a care, no 
A dance life's harsh meadows 
faced with violence in the open air 
for an audience so vacant and hollow 
in the realm of shadows where we dare 
We found connection beyond compare 
your words echo a defiant declaration 
but did they give a fucking care? No.

tracks.title: Alternate Endings
tracks.lyrics:
In the quiet of the night, a shadow haunts my mind,
A ghostly whisper, telling tales I can't unwind.
In the mirror's gaze, I see the cracks within my soul,
A labyrinth of secrets, where I have no control.

Searching for the answers in a world that feels so blind,
Digging through the darkness, but the truth I cannot find.
Building up the chaos just to make it feel aligned,
In these alternate endings, my pain is redefined.

Broken glass beneath my feet, a path I can't retrace,
I sabotage my life, leaving fragments in my wake.
Relationships in ruin, like a mirror smashed to dust,
I wear a mask of sanity, but inside I’m fucked up

Searching for the answers in a world that feels so blind,
Digging through the darkness, but the truth I cannot find.
Building up the chaos just to make it feel aligned,
In these alternate endings, my pain is redefined.

I try to piece together all the memories that I lack,
But every time I think I've found it, I'm dragged further back.
Self-destruction seems to be the only way to cope,
To match my outer chaos with the pain that stole my hope.

Searching for the answers in a world that feels so blind,
Digging through the darkness, but the truth I cannot find.
Building up the chaos just to make it feel aligned,
In these alternate endings, my pain is redefined.
